definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: The equipartition law of energy is also briefly demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 同時，對能均分原理也作了簡潔的論證。

sentences.english: The two boys divided the marbles they won fifty-fifty.
sentences.chinese: 兩個男孩把他們贏來的石彈平均分配了。

sentences.english: If the ranking of homing pigeons is not full, prize of other rankings shall be equally allocated by winning pigeons.
sentences.chinese: 如歸巢獲名次未滿剩餘名次獎金由獲獎鴿均分。

sentences.english: The report says male students scored an average of four points higher than female students.
sentences.chinese: 報告顯示，男生比女生的平均分高四分。

sentences.english: The conquered territories were portioned out among the victors.
sentences.chinese: 被征服的領土在勝利者之間被均分了。

sentences.english: It's called the equipartition of energy.
Law of equipartition of energy is proved by the promotion of Boltzmann distribution Law.
sentences.chinese: 通過對玻耳茲曼分佈律的推廣，從而證明能均分定理。

sentences.english: If there is no homing pigeon within the valid date, the prize shall be equally allocated by participation pigeons.
sentences.chinese: 如有效期內無鴿歸巢則獎金由決賽鴿均分。

sentences.english: I have said, Thou and Ziba divide the land.
sentences.chinese: 我說，你與洗巴均分地土。

sentences.english: The straight-line method of depreciation divides the depreciable cost evenly over the useful life of an asset.
sentences.chinese: 直線折舊法在某資產可用年限內均分折舊成本。

sentences.english: The winning team in such a case will be given the mean average score for all other rounds debated in the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 對方隊自動獲勝，其得分爲本輪所有獲勝隊的平均分。

sentences.english: Is any part of the production sub-contracted out to a third party?
sentences.chinese: 是否任何部分的生產均分包給第三方？

sentences.english: Can you figure out his average score ?
sentences.chinese: 你能算出他的平均分嗎？

sentences.english: For example, their average math and reading scores were in the top quarter.
sentences.chinese: 例如，他們的數學和閱讀平均分就排在前四分之一。

sentences.english: Dividing all territory and resources equally cannot solve this problem.
sentences.chinese: 平均分配土地和資源也無法根除這個問題。

definition: to divide (into)/to split a bonus/to break into/tenths/percentage allotment
to distribute/to assign/to allocate/to partition (a hard drive)
a couple where both spouses are not Hong Kong citizens
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
to hand over to/to give to higher authority/to seek connections in high places
